meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hoggish
meanings.sent1: Her hoggishnesses were evident when she refused to share her food.
meanings.sent2: The hoggishnesses of the pig were clear as it gobbled up all the slop.
meanings.sent3: The hoggishnesses of the raccoon stealing all the snacks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His hoggishnesses in devouring the entire cake were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The hoggishnesses of the bear raiding the beehive was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a hog
meanings.sent1: The hoggishnesses of the child at the buffet reminded me of a hungry pig.
meanings.sent2: I could see the hoggishnesses in the way the boar snorted and rooted around.
meanings.sent3: His hoggishnesses at the dinner table were comical as he piled his plate high.
meanings.sent4: The hoggishnesses of the shoppers on Black Friday resembled a pack of wild hogs.
meanings.sent5: The hoggishnesses of the dog at dinner time was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being greedy or selfish, like a hog
meanings.sent1: Her hoggishnesses in taking all the credit for the project upset her team.
meanings.sent2: The hoggishnesses of the CEO were evident in his excessive bonuses.
meanings.sent3: The hoggishnesses of the squirrel hoarding all the nuts made the other animals chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His hoggishnesses in demanding more than his fair share caused tension in the group.
meanings.sent5: The hoggishnesses of the seagulls fighting over the fish scraps was a noisy spectacle.
